attributes.action: Establish an investigation into Russian interference in the Brexit referendum
attributes.additional_details: The 2016 Brexit referendum had a huge effect on the lives of all British citizens. The very close result makes it imperative to ensure that it was 'safe' and not illegitimately interfered with by an external agency.
attributes.background: In the light of the ISC report on Russian interference in the British political system, the government must urgently establish an independent investigation into whether Russia attempted to influence the 2016 Brexit referendum.
